name: Candy Baby (gameashlar)
description:
The world is in danger. All the candy and chocolates have become extinct. Children are looking for it, but no one is able to find it. How will the world survive without chocolates?
Then miracles happen and one chocolate named  " Candy Baby " takes the burden to save the world, bringing back all the chocolate. Candy Baby has decided to go to the chocolate factory and revive all the candy, and chocolates. But before reaching the destination will he be able to escape the home? Will it be able to turn evil chocolate into fine,  textured chocolate? Will candy baby be able to reach the factory?
In the path of search, there are a lot of problems and troubles, of the biggest problem for the candy baby is, that it melts at room temperature.

Will it be able to Survive? Will it be able to save the world and get all the chocolates the human needs?

Play the surviving journey of Candy Baby and find out.

Controls -
 A and D or Left Arrow or Right Arrow to Move Left and Right.
W or Up Arrow  For Jet Pack
Left Mouse Button or E for Attack

note - Attack does not work when Candy baby loses hands.
